content:
I noticed that the draft contributor survey has this question:

Have you contributed or ever considered contributing to the official Rust project (e.g. any repo that is part of the rust-lang GitHub org)?

Should it mention rust-lang-nursery as well? Perhaps not, but I wanted to bring it up in case it should be mentioned :)
Yea probably, but I imagine the amount of people who contribute to the nursery and not the main org is very small
thanks for the suggestion @Noah Lev , ill go ahead and update that rn
